Reviews.Title: “A lot better than expected.”
Reviews.Author: Sami K
Reviews.Content: admit reading reviews changed hotel pleasantly surprised hotel supposedly 4th floor appeared recently renovated spotless bathroom shiny clean marble decorations third floor refurbished stay march 2012 contrary earlier reviews free wifi available password reception pay computers lobby rate hotel 3star price doubt found location bearable termini station easily reachable bus 360 seemingly short intervals quick 2 stops train connection piazza del popolo train station acqua 510 minutes walk hotel
